title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Experimental Education for Lightweight Gas Separation Membrane Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the structural stability of carbon-nitrogen-based membranes through VR simulations and apply findings to experimental planning
Learners can explain the adsorption-diffusion-permeation mechanisms of light gases (hydrogen, helium, etc.) using experimental data
Learners can design educational experiment modules based on membrane performance evaluation results and submit them as project deliverables
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
